headline: Evaluating AMETEK (AME) After Strong Multi‑Year Share Price Performance
summary: If you are wondering whether AMETEK's current share price lines up with its underlying worth, this article will walk through what the numbers actually suggest. The stock last closed at US$233.51, with returns of 1.6% over 7 days, 5.8% over 30 days, 11.7% year to date, 26.3% over 1 year, 69.0% over 3 years and 104.5% over 5 years. This raises the question of how that track record lines up against its valuation. Recent coverage has focused on AMETEK's position in capital goods and how...
